captions.long: There is a pair of brown glasses that are folded and are represented by the node "glasses." There is a container with a yellow color and a small size represented by the node "container". The node "mat" represents a green mat that is on the floor, represented by the node "floor". There is a hanging towel that is moss colored, represented by the node "towel." Several small octagonal tiles are on the floor, represented by nodes "tile". There is also a box standing up that holds AquaFresh toothpaste, represented by the node "box". There is a cup that holds three toothbrushes, represented by the node "cup", which also contains the nodes "tooth-brush" (three of them), and the handles for both the hot and cold water on the sink. There are two walls: one painted light blue and one painted white, represented by the nodes "wall". There is also a white bar of soap, represented by the node "soap". Additionally, there is a sink, represented by the nodes "sink" (two of them), and a medicine cabinet, represented by the node "cabinet". The bathroom is represented by the node "bathroom", which also contains a white-tiled floor (represented by the node "floor"), a sink (represented by the node "sink"), a shelf (represented by the node "shelf"), and medicine (represented by the node "medicine"). Finally, there is a collection of toothbrushes represented by the node "toothbrushes".
captions.short: Brown glasses, a yellow container, green mat on floor, hanging moss-colored towel, small octagonal floor tiles, standing toothpaste box, cup with three toothbrushes, hot and cold water handles, light blue and white walls, white soap bar, two sinks, medicine cabinet, toothbrushes. There is also a shrub in front of the tree, bushes behind the elephants, and a bush behind a nearby bush. The forest has trees, and one of the trees has a branch attached to its trunk with moss. There is also a curve on a cement sidewalk, a shallow hole in the ground, a pathway made of dirt, a long wooden log, and various green plants. In addition to the elephants, there is a group of animals enclosed by a metal fence with tusks, and there are individual elephants of various sizes including a walking baby elephant, a baby elephant, and an adult elephant with a large trunk and a large branch.
